summary: This document is an email chain from October 2019 regarding the FBI Victim Services Division organizing briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein. It involves an attorney from Boies Schiller Flexner LLP coordinating attendance for their clients at sessions in New York and Florida, and includes security clearance procedures for accessing federal buildings.

persons.name: VictimServices
persons.context: The email address and division organizing the victim briefings and handling RSVPs and security information.

persons.name: Attorney
persons.context: An attorney (likely from Boies Schiller Flexner) who added notes to an RSVP, mentioning a client who cannot travel and requesting phone assistance.

persons.name: Mr.
persons.context: An attorney (first name redacted) whose schedule permits him to attend the victim's meeting with the email sender and their clients; he is currently in trial.

persons.name: Partner
persons.role: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP
persons.context: The signatory of the email, a partner at the law firm, providing contact information and thanking the FBI for organizing the victim briefing sessions.

persons.name: FBI Victim Specialist
persons.context: The FBI specialist from the New York Field Office who sent the original invitation and follow-up emails, coordinating the logistics and security for the victim briefings.

connections.description: The attorney is communicating with the FBI Victim Services Division to arrange client attendance and request accommodations for a victim who cannot travel.
The law firm partner is corresponding with the FBI Victim Specialist to RSVP for victim briefings and provide necessary security information.
Mr. is an attorney who will be attending the victim meeting with the email-sending attorney and their clients, indicating they work together or are associated on the case.
The partner represents multiple victims of Jeffrey Epstein and is coordinating their attendance at FBI briefings.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Miami
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division hosts a briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein at the Miami Field Office.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division hosts a briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein at the New York Field Office.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division organized two briefings in October 2019 for victims of Jeffrey Epstein, one in Miami on October 15 and one in New York on October 23.
A law firm, Boies Schiller Flexner LLP, was representing multiple victims and coordinating their attendance, including for a victim who could not travel and required phone accommodation.
Attendance at the federal building briefings required detailed security clearance information, including full name, firm, email, phone, social security number, address, and citizenship.
The email chain shows professional coordination between victim attorneys and the FBI regarding victim support and investigation updates post-Epstein's arrest and death.
The document highlights the ongoing federal outreach to Epstein victims in late 2019, following his death in August 2019.
